screen.name: radar_map_screen
screen.description: Displays an interactive real-time weather radar map.

components.description: Interactive component displaying real-time weather radar.
Button to play time-lapse radar data.

component_instances.description: Interactive component displaying real-time weather radar.
Button to play time-lapse radar data.

component_types.name: InteractiveMap
component_types.description: An interactive map component to display real-time data with pan and zoom capabilities.

supported_props.description: Source URL or data for the map.
supported_props.name: src

supported_props.description: Callback function for user interactions like pan and zoom.
supported_props.name: onInteraction

component_types.name: IconButton
component_types.description: An icon button used to initiate a search.

supported_props.name: icon
supported_props.description: Name of the icon to display.

supported_props.name: onClick
supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.
